channel.title: Shard
channel.description:
ive searched all over the net, but havent found anything. could someone post a link to a shard source.
only need server side. ty

item.title: Shard
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:9, topic:527083”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=645831.msg4343967#msg4343967 date=1375574717]

http://up.ht/16QqrtC

2mb? lol…

What? I give you a working link and it’s still not good?

2mb is a bit small for server side coding

I think you miss the huge client class bro.
[/quote]
Uhm, if I recall correctly, Shard’s client class is not big at all.[/quote]
Yes which is why I said he misses it.

Read full topic
